question: Which state's legislative Assembly passed the Andhra Pradesh Disha Bill, 2019?
explanation: The Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly passed the Andhra Pradesh Disha Bill, 2019 . Disha is the name given to the veterinarian who was raped and murdered in Hyderabad on 27 November and sparked an outrage across country. Recently, Delhi Commission of Women Chief Swati Maliwal has written a letter to Prime Minister Narendra Modi demanding immediate implementation of Disha Bill in entire country.
